name: WP-xPerts Woocommerce Custom Thank you Page
author: Sajid Hussain

sections.description:
Wp-xPerts woocommerce custom thank you page plugin enables you to create a custom thank you page.
Admin will be redirected to custom thank you page after successful checkout.
This way you can create a custom thank you message too

Options

  • select target redirect page
  • option for custom/external URL added
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Woo Thank-You Page to manage redirect.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • initial release bug solved
  • option for DEFAULT selection

1.2

  • option for custom/external URL added
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Woo Thank-You Page to manage redirect.

short_description: This plugin enables you to create a custom thank you page. Admin will be redirected to custom thank you page after successful checkout
